meanings.definition: A wild party or celebration involving excessive indulgence in food and drink.
meanings.sent1: The orgies at the birthday party included lots of cake and soda.
meanings.sent2: They had orgies at the festival with plenty of snacks and beverages.
meanings.sent3: The orgies at the picnic got a bit out of hand with all the treats.
meanings.sent4: Her love for orgies of sweets was unmatched by anyone in the family.
meanings.sent5: The orgies of flavors in the buffet left everyone satisfied and happy.

meanings.definition: Unrestrained indulgence in a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: His orgies of video gaming kept him up all night.
meanings.sent2: She indulged in orgies of reading during her summer break.
meanings.sent3: The orgies of shopping on Black Friday were exhausting but fun.
meanings.sent4: Their orgies of laughter filled the room with joy and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The orgies of painting in the art class allowed for creative expression.
